data.text:
In our opinion, we say that this hotel does not deserve to be recommended. 

Indeed, the territory is super. And olny this is reason we rate this hotel 2. The hotel area and the beach are very beautiful, there is availible sunbeds by the pool and the internet (Wi-Fi) is really available as promised. 

Everything else leaves much to be desired: The food is very monotonous and tasteless. There is no difference between lunch and dinner, all the same dishes. Eating the same meal for a week is bit annoying.

Rooms are tired. We managed without the bidet hose, which was missing, and the flooded floor after every shower, because shower cabin was leaking. However, we would expect the room and towels still to be clean. We needed to contact hotel customer servise rep. to get the room clean and to have everything in the room for the three of us. 

Staff attitude was very poor. Not welcoming at all. Bartenders ignored us at the counter. Chatting with eachother or talking on the phone. Drinks were not offered al lunch and not even at dinner!! You must go yourseft to counter and order vine, witch will be served to you in hot glass! 

We know that tipping goes a long way in such countries, but it didn't help here ðŸ«¤ 

We would not recomment this hotel.
data.title: Very disappointing!

data.text: I love the location, itâ€™s a great place to enjoy a view on the old town, mountains and of course sea. I would recommend this place for everyone who likes great services, kind and polite staff. Food is good, you will be satisfied, a variety of choiceâ€¦Come here, check yourself, you will be amazed
data.title: Amazing holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear guest, thank you for choosing Albatros Sharm Resort for your recent holiday and for your feedback. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your vacation and created new nice memories. We consider it necessary to note that we follow the reviews with great attention and are constantly working on the quality of the service provided. We will be sincerely glad to see you again. With the kindest regards, Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Albatros Sharm Guest Relation

data.text: Lovely beach, had such a great time at the foam party today. The animation team were great fun. Nice snack bar good variety and food and drinks really nice morning definitely coming back the service was really good bar staff so friendly very nice experience
data.title: Foam party

Amazing experience! Fantastic animation team especially Libby who was so sweet, the beach is very beautiful and I liked my time and will recommend this hotel to friends and familyâ€™s and for sure like to come again.
Great holiday in Sharm El Sheikh

data.text: When I arrived at the hotel I was not preoccupied with the room I was initially given, but it was no problem to change rooms. There is pleasant service at the hotel, and there is a very large area with nice green areas. Big plus with the large private beach.
data.title: Perfect for solo travelers
